titleInfo.title: Easter Egg Hunt at the Colemere Club, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 April 05

mods.identifier: Banner Easter Egg hunt Colemere Club Apr5 1958 - 1047 007

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A scene from the Easter Egg Hunt hosted at the Colemere Country Club on April 5th, 1958. A large crowd of happy children participated in the event. The Colemere mansion and acreage, located on Murfreesboro Road near the airport, was owned by the City of Nashville at the time. It was a meeting place for civic leaders and the cityâ€™s political set. Forms part of Nashville Banner Negatives Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
